short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visual rapresentation of championmastery's summoner table

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension created to see at a glance the status of the levels of the various champions.
The data is taken from the table provided by the ChampionMasteryLookup site
